name: GOLF KEEPER
description:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/eng.png

This game does not have one way to complete the level. Real hardcore!



Casual golf, where with one hit you need to score a ball in the hole.
You can control the ball trajectory by adding various elements to the field.
Details: rebound where the ball will fly.
Chips:
  • campaign
  • level editor
  • -the ability to share your level with a friend

A game for strategists and adventurers.
